name: uzh_telegram
description: Done! Congratulations on your new bot. You will find it at t.me/rosca_uzh_bot. You can now add a description, about section and profile picture for your bot, see /help for a list of commands. By the way, when you've finished creating your cool bot, ping our Bot Support if you want a better username for it. Just make sure the bot is fully operational before you do this.
